{% extends "_layouts/skeleton.html" %} {% set content %} # Form snippets template reference All user snippet methods are available under the `pt.snippets.forms` template variable, and give you a set of useful shortcut methods for quickly generating form elements. ## Available methods

pt.snippets.forms.open([ attrs ])

  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the opening form tag.

Generates an opening form tag, with optional attributes

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.open({'action':'/index.php/test'}) }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.close()

Generates an closing form tag

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.close() }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.label([ text [, target [, attrs ]]])

  • text: (optional) Text to use for the label. Defaults to 'Label'.
  • target: (optional) ID of the input that this label describes.
  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the label.

Generates a label element.

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.label('Pet name', 'pet-name', {'class':'required'}) }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.button([ text [, attrs ]])

  • text: (optional) Text to use for the button. Defaults to 'Submit'.
  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the button.

Generates a button element.

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.button('Release hounds', {'id':'uhoh'}) }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.text([ name [, value [, attrs ]]])

  • name: (optional) Name for the field. Defaults to a random string.
  • value: (optional) Value for the field.
  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the field.

Generates a text input field.

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.text('pet-name', null, {'placeholder':'e.g. Fido'}) }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.email([ name [, value [, attrs ]]])

  • name: (optional) Name for the field. Defaults to a random string.
  • value: (optional) Value for the field.
  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the field.

Generates a email input field.

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.email('electronic-mail', 'fido@dogs.com') }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.password([ name [, value [, attrs ]]])

  • name: (optional) Name for the field. Defaults to a random string.
  • value: (optional) Value for the field.
  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the field.

Generates a password input field.

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.password('shhh') }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.hidden([ name [, value [, attrs ]]])

  • name: (optional) Name for the field. Defaults to a random string.
  • value: (optional) Value for the field.
  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the field.

Generates a hidden input field.

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.hidden('group-id', 23) }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.select([ name [, value [, opts [, attrs ]]]])

  • name: (optional) Name for the field. Defaults to a random string.
  • value: (optional) Value for the field.
  • opts: (optional) Value:Label array of options for the select field.
  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the field.

Generates a select field.

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.select('cat-choice', 'persian', {
    'Tabby': 'tabby',
    'Persian': 'persian',
    'Lion': 'rarrghh'
}) }}
{% endraw %}

pt.snippets.forms.textarea([ name [, value [, attrs ]]])

  • name: (optional) Name for the field. Defaults to a random string.
  • value: (optional) Value for the field.
  • attrs: (optional) Array of additional attributes to set on the field.

Generates a textarea field.

{% raw %}
{{ pt.snippets.forms.textarea(null, 'Hello!') }}
{% endraw %}
{% endset %}
